articles.author: Helena Kelly
articles.title: First class American Airlines passenger has a TANTRUM 'like a 5-year-old' when he's refused a drink - Daily Mail
articles.description: A first class passenger has gone viral after he was filmed having a tearful meltdown when he was arrested over a row about a pre-take-off gin and tonic.
articles.content:
A first class passenger has gone viral after he was filmed having a tearful meltdown when he was arrested over a row about a pre-take-off gin and tonic.
